about_the_game:
Deadly precision, steady aim! With satisfyingly powerful bolts, every impact from this crossbow rifle is going to send your foes reeling backwards, as they’re torn apart by lightning-fast arrows!
This Weapon Bundle contains;
- The Crossbow Rifle
- 2 Charms (Helm, Rebellion Coin)
- 2 Bespoke Weapon Skins (Toy, Ornate).
